name: Violet Hubris
description:
A cosmic action-horror game exploring humanity’s thirst for knowledge, power, and belonging in a harsh universe. 

Play as Violet Hubris; a trans woman and scientist (accompanied by CLAIR, her AI assistant), who opens an interdimensional door into an otherworldly prison. Delve deeper into the prison, battling eldritch abominations.

We'd also love to hear your thoughts on the game to better improve the experience! https://forms.gle/rUyLiAfRtHdQqXbLA
